function Mental_LV1()
    -- ※以下、③を選択した場合
    -- .女装稽古【精神】LV.1「女の子との接触に慣れましょう」

    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG,"")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",1000,false)

    -- //BG：アキラ宅
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG023aa")

    -- //BU：アキラ（通常・部屋着）
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_AKI03aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",1000,false)

PLAY_BGM("BGM14.wav",0,true)

PLAY_VOICE("akira_1334.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】
 "You chose the mental lesson, huh? Good choice, this is the easiest training." ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN03ea")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_1461.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】
 "Eh, really? Seriously!?" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_AKI03eb")
SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)
PLAY_VOICE("akira_1335.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】
 "Yes, really. No need to go outside or change into sexy clothes. Just sleep soundly for one night." ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN03ja")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_1462.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】
 "Yay!" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    MSG([[ I’m so happy I could cry. I understand I have to get used to cross-dressing, but I’m very glad the training is easy. ]])

    MSG([[ And all I have to do is sleep... what a wonderful day. ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_AKI03aa")
SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)
PLAY_VOICE("akira_1336.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】
 "Then, shall we go to the bedroom?" ]])

    MSG([[ Akira takes my hand and tries to lead me to her own room. ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN03ca")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_1463.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】
 "A-Akira? Why are you trying to take me to your room?" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

PLAY_VOICE("akira_1337.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】
 "As I said earlier, Minachin, you’ll get plenty of sleep." ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_AKI03ka")
SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)
PLAY_VOICE("akira_1338.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】
 "But right next to me, of course." ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN03ga")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_1464.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】
 "...Huh?" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

STOP_BGM(1000)

    -- 　　　　　◆
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask006" , 1000,false)


    -- //CG：アキラとの添い寝（ニヤリ）
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "EV048ab")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask006" , 1000,false)

    PLAY_BGM("BGM11.wav",0,true)

PLAY_VOICE("akira_1339.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】
 "Hey hey, Minachin. Why won’t you turn towards me?" ]])

PLAY_VOICE("minato_1465.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】
 "W-Well, um..." ]])

    MSG([[ I had a feeling, but this is definitely not easy training. ]])

    MSG([[ Right now, I’m lying side by side, on the same bed, under the same blanket as a girl. ]])

    MSG([[ Skin touching skin. The sound of her breathing in my ear. The soft scent of citrus shampoo drifting. ]])

    MSG([[ Even though Akira is my cousin, this situation is way too stimulating for me. ]])

PLAY_VOICE("akira_1340.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】
 "Oh my~? Could it be you’re embarrassed? We used to often nap together when we were little, didn’t we?" ]])

PLAY_VOICE("minato_1466.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】
 "W-We’re totally different ages now, right...? Of course I’m embarrassed." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("akira_1341R.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】
 "Mufufu, seems like you just can’t suppress your desires, huh." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("akira_1342.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】
 "You don’t usually treat me like a girl, but Minachin is still a boy underneath it all. Underneath the surface, you’re a hungry wolf, aren’t you?" ]])

PLAY_VOICE("minato_1467.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】
 "Ugh..." ]])

    MSG([[ It’s frustrating, but with how I am now, I can’t argue. ]])

    MSG([[ I grew up in a family of women and played with girls a lot, so I thought I had some tolerance for girls, but I’m totally hopeless. ]])

    MSG([[ Just touching skin with a girl makes my heart race. My face burns red. I want to die in self-loathing. ]])

    -- //CG：アキラとの添い寝（笑顔）
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "EV048aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000,false)

PLAY_VOICE("akira_1343.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】
 "Well, I knew Minachin had a pure pure pure heart, so this is exactly the reaction I expected." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("akira_1344.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】
 "The problem is that at this rate, you’ll definitely slip up while attending Yuriai Private Academy." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("minato_1468.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】
 "Eh? There won’t be opportunities to sleep next to someone at the academy, right...?" ]])

PLAY_VOICE("akira_1345.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】
 "You don’t get it. Between girls, it’s normal to hug and touch each other as skinship." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("akira_1346.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】
 "Well, I’m socially awkward, so I’ve actually never experienced that myself<sprite="Emoji" name="star">" ]])

    MSG([[ A chill ran down my spine, so much that I couldn’t retort to Akira’s self-deprecation. ]])

    MSG([[ Akira’s right—at Yuriai Private Academy, I’ve often seen students hugging each other. ]])

    MSG([[ If I become a target of that...? ]])

PLAY_VOICE("akira_1347.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】
 "In an all-girls environment, because there are no men’s eyes to worry about, skinship gets intense. You, Minachin, will definitely become prey one day." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("akira_1348.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】
 "Also, in any story about infiltrating a prestigious girls’ school, there’s no way the lucky pervert god won’t appear. Long live lucky perverts!" ]])

PLAY_VOICE("minato_1469.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】
 "Well, that’s blunt..." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("akira_1349.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】
 "Anyway. Inescapable sexy situations aside, I want you to build up tolerance by sleeping next to me." ]])

    -- //CG：アキラとの添い寝（ニヤリ）
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "EV048ab")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000,false)

PLAY_VOICE("akira_1350.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】
 "It should be bearable since it’s me, your cousin, right?" ]])

    MSG([[ Akira smiled happily again. ]])

    MSG([[ As expected of Akira. She doesn’t seem nervous at all. ]])

    MSG([[ Unlike me, she probably doesn’t see me as the opposite sex at all. ]])

PLAY_VOICE("minato_1470.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】
 "I-I’ll do my best. Cousins, after all. I’m not supposed to get nervous." ]])

    -- //CG：アキラとの添い寝（悲しみ）
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "EV048ae")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000,false)

PLAY_VOICE("akira_1351.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】
 "Ugh..." ]])

    -- //CG：アキラとの添い寝（赤面）
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "EV048ad")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000,false)

PLAY_VOICE("akira_1352.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】
 "Y-Yeah, of course. Minachin, don’t say such obvious things." ]])
    -- //テンパり気味に、ちょっと早口。

PLAY_VOICE("akira_1353.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】
 "I’m a girl of age too. If you weren’t my cousin, there’s no way I’d sleep next to a guy." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("akira_1354.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】
 "A-Anyway, enough unnecessary chit-chat." ]])

    -- //CG：アキラとの添い寝（笑顔）
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "EV048aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000,false)

PLAY_VOICE("akira_1355.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】
 "Spend the night with me like this and get used to skin-to-skin contact with women." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("minato_1471.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】
 "St-Stop with the suggestive phrases..." ]])

    MSG([[ Still unsettled by my pounding heartbeat, I took slow, quiet breaths to calm myself. ]])

    MSG([[ Akira’s right. If I don’t get used to being close to girls here and now, I’ll definitely regret it later. ]])

    MSG([[ Akira, who normally dislikes contact with others, has bravely agreed to sleep next to me. ]])

    MSG([[ I have to properly return that kindness! ]])

    -- //CG：アキラとの添い寝（ニヤリ）
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "EV048ab")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000,false)

PLAY_VOICE("akira_1356.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】
 "Looks like your heart has checked out." ]])

    -- //SE：肉を揉む音
PLAY_SE("SEa001.wav")
WAIT(800)

PLAY_VOICE("minato_1472.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】
 "Eek!?" ]])

    MSG([[ I made a weird noise when she suddenly squeezed my chest. ]])

    MSG([[ Ah… well, I don’t actually have a chest big enough to squeeze right now. ]])

PLAY_VOICE("minato_1473.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】
 "What are you doing!? That scared me!" ]])

PLAY_VOICE("akira_1357.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】
 "I’m trying to recreate the skinship between girls." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("minato_1474.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】
 "There’s no skinship like that, right? Girls don’t say stuff like ‘heart has checked out’ in everyday life, do they?" ]])

    -- //CG：アキラとの添い寝（悲しみ）
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "EV048ae")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000,false)

PLAY_VOICE("akira_1358.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】
 "I-I'm sorry... I’m socially awkward and have little experience with girl-to-girl skinship." ]])

    MSG([[ Akira started quietly crying. ]])

    MSG([[ This reaction is unfair... I can’t say anything back. ]])

    -- //CG：アキラとの添い寝（ニヤリ）
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "EV048ab")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000,false)

PLAY_VOICE("akira_1359.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】
 "I’ll take that heart of yours." ]])

    -- //SE：肉を揉む音
PLAY_SE("SEa001.wav")
WAIT(800)

PLAY_VOICE("minato_1475.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】
 "Eek!?" ]])

    MSG([[ Once again, I made a weird noise when she squeezed my chest. ]])

    MSG([[ As I said before, I don’t actually have a chest big enough to squeeze right now. ]])

PLAY_VOICE("minato_1476.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】
 "That was intentional, right!? Like the way it’s widely used to mean something different!?" ]])

PLAY_VOICE("akira_1360.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】
 "That’s called a deliberate offense. I’m a girl too... and I can’t help but want to grab a guy’s heart." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("minato_1477.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】
 "Th-The ‘heart’ in those lines usually means feelings, right? You came to grab my actual heart just now. It’s the kind of line that would lead to a fight, not romance, right?" ]])

PLAY_VOICE("akira_1361.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】
 "So, you’re saying I was not a deliberate offender but a <r=ごいはん>mistaken offender</r>? As expected of Minachin, your sharp comebacks are like Gae Bolg." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("minato_1478.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】
 "That’s not what I meant!" ]])

    MSG([[ I got carried away by Akira and lost all my nervousness. I returned to my usual energy. ]])

    MSG([[ At this rate, I should be able to endure sleeping next to Akira for one night. ]])

    MSG([[ In the end, she teased me the whole day. ]])

    MSG([[ It took quite a while before I could fall asleep. ]])

    -- //CG：アキラとの添い寝（ぐっすり）
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "EV048ac")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000,false)

PLAY_VOICE("akira_1362.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】
 "Suu... suuu..." ]])

    MSG([[ Watching Akira’s sleeping face as she fell asleep before me, I gradually drifted toward sleep as well. ]])

    MSG([[ While resisting the sleepiness, my hand naturally reached out to the head of my beloved cousin, who was putting her body on the line for me. ]])

    MSG([[ I gently stroked her soft wavy hair like that of a kitten and whispered softly. ]])

PLAY_VOICE("minato_1479.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】
 "...Surely you noticed I was still nervous and playfully reached out to me on purpose." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("minato_1480.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】
 "Thank you... Akira. I’ll do my best properly." ]])

    MSG([[ While working on the assignment Akira prepared, I tried to grow little by little―― ]])

    MSG([[ I silently vowed to myself once again. ]])

    -- Mental パラメーター更新
    SaveData.TrainingParam.Mental = 1

    -- 3	オトメ＊ベッドイン	『精神』レベルを１以上にした
    UNLOCK_TROPHY(3)

    -- 　　　　◆
STOP_BGM(1000)
LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "")
SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000,false)
WAIT_INPUT(1000)

    TrainingStatusUp("Mental" , 1)

    ScenarioManager.TrainingNext()
end
